Title: Arduino Code for Behavioral Experiment Control and Data Acquisition
Creator: Deep Brain Lab, Multimedia Department, Gdańsk University of Technology
Subject: This script is integral to experiments studying learning and memory in rats. It provides real-time feedback, precise event logging, and dynamic sequence adaptation.
Description:
This Arduino script is designed for controlling behavioral experiments involving rats. It manages LED-based guidance, sequence learning, reward systems, and button press detection for memory tasks. The code integrates features such as:
- Multi-step reward dispensing mechanisms.
- Configuration for multiple experimental protocols (e.g., early training, sequence learning, retrieval).
The script interacts with hardware components like DotStar LEDs and buttons to provide dynamic visual guidance and reward signaling.
Publisher: Deep Brain Lab, Sound and Multimedia Department, Politechnika Gdańsk
